home.maintext: A Full Stack Developer skilled in building end-to-end software solutions

about.1: I'm Wessel, a full-stack software developer with {exp} year(s) of experience. I’m skilled in building both the front-end and back-end of web applications, including creating databases and integrating software to Azure. I ensure that all components work seamlessly together, delivering fully integrated, end-to-end solutions.
about.2: I’ve been in love with Norway, its culture and language since childhood, and moving there is a dream I've always had. I speak fluent Norwegian, and working in Norway—whether remotely or, ideally, in-office—is my top priority. I’m excited to take the necessary steps to make this childhood dream a reality.

education.description: Completed a 4-year bachelor's degree with a focus on software development, including web development, databases and system design/architecture. Specialized in web development and design.

mysolution.d1: Developed a fully customizable web platform for Mysolution using React, TypeScript, and Java Spring, allowing businesses to personalize their websites.
mysolution.d2: Built a Java Spring backend to handle traffic between the web app and Salesforce server, integrating a SQLite database to store customer settings.
mysolution.d3: Implemented secure JWT authentication, CRUD operations, and followed best practices for data security.
mysolution.d4: Ensured full GDPR compliance through extensive research and adherence to data protection regulations.

contact.text1: Interested / just want to chat? So do I!
contact.text2: Send me a message on one of these platforms and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
